text: Rascal Flatts is a country rock band from Columbus, Ohio. They became a band in 1999 and released their debut album Rascal Flatts in 2000. They are signed to Lyric Street records and have won many CMT and ACM awards. Their newest album is Unstoppable, which came to stores in 2009. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Rascal Flatts (2000) * Melt (2002) * Feels Like Today (2004) * Me and My Gang (2006) * Still Feels Good (2007) * Unstoppable (2009) * Nothing Like This (2009) == References == == Other websites == * Rascal Flatts Official website Category:Country bands Category:Musicians from Columbus, Ohio Category:Musical groups from Ohio Category:Big Machine Records artists Category:1999 establishments in the United States
title: Rascal Flatts
